name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Motion Shot - Informative screen guides & tutorials!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Informative shareable walkthrough guides under minutes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert your knowledge base into informative guides that help your customer support, new hires, students, online communities in a step-by-step format!

This plugin is companion for MotionShot. Once you have an account and required plan to make guides on MotionShot, you can use this plugin to capture the screens and clicks and make a guide out of it. It eliminates taking the screenshots manually!

For more information on MotionShot, checkout https://www.motionshot.app or send an email to hey@motionshot.app
